title: Back in Balance
description: At Back in Balance we help people create more balance in their bodies and their lives using acupuncture, herbal medicine and Reiki.
cleaned_text: Denise Lavender L.Ac. MAcOM welcomes you! Back in Balance is a complementary and alternative health care provider in south central Austin offering Traditional Chinese Medicine (acupuncture, herbs, and classical Chinese massage) and Reiki to help you bring balance and health into your mind, body, and spirit. At Back in Balance we work with your personal needs and specialize in: Pain management - Neck, back, and shoulder pain - Sports injuries - Sciatica - Migraines - Arthritis - Fibromyalgia Women's health - Perimenopause and Menopause - Hot flashes and night sweats - Irregular and painful menstruation - Herbal hormone replacement therapy (HRT) - PMS and menstrual disorders - Fertility issues Psycho-emotional Insomnia Seasonal allergies [Acupuncturist Treats 40 N.F.L. Players in 4 Cities ](http://www.nytimes.com/2010/11/30/sports/football/30acupuncture.html) Call (512) 899-8686 or
